header.title: Why Smart?
header.description: Learn about the benefits of integrating our three solutions: SmartConnect, SmartChart and SmartWork. Try them now!

nodes.title: Consolidated information
nodes.description: Manage from one place the contact information of your collaborators as well as the structure and job profiles of your company.

nodes.title: Easy to use
nodes.description: Intuitive applications that facilitate implementation in your organization, with web and mobile versions. Also perfect for personal use!

nodes.title: Security and privacy
nodes.description: Through our role and session system, assign permissions and guarantee the safe use of information by sharing what you want.

nodes.title: Immediate update
nodes.description: Our applications allow any modification made to be consulted in real time by all users who share such information.

nodes.title: Smart investment
nodes.description: Enjoy all the benefits of efficient and innovative applications at an affordable cost. Try them today!

nodes.title: Collaborative environment
nodes.description: Work together with your teammates at the same time. Forget the old days where you were looking for who has the latest updated version.
